v.v: God truly is good to us Israelite people,
As for me, I almost stopped trusting in God;
because I saw those who proudly said that they did not need God, and I wanted to be like them.
Those people do not suffer from sickness;
They do not have the troubles that other people have;
So they are proud, as proud as a woman with a beautiful necklace.
From their inner beings pour out evil deeds,
They scoff at other people, and they talk about doing evil things to them;
They say evil things about God, who is in heaven,
The result is that people pay attention to them
Wicked people say to themselves, “God will certainly not know what we have done;
That is what wicked people are like;
So, God, I think it is useless that I have always done what you want me to
During each day I have problems,
But if I had said these things out loud in front of others,
When I tried to think completely about these things,
But when I went to your temple, you spoke to me,
Now I know that you will surely put them in dangerous places
They will be destroyed instantly;
They will disappear as quickly as a dream disappears when a person awakes in the morning;
When I felt sad in my inner being
I was stupid and ignorant,
But I am always close to you,
You guide me by teaching me,
You are in heaven, and I belong to you;
My body and my mind may become very weak,
Those who remain far from you will be destroyed;
But as for me, it is wonderful to be near to God

v: to those who, with all their inner being, want to do all that he desires.
I was almost guilty of committing a great sin against him
I saw that they became wealthy even though they were wicked.
they are always strong and healthy.
they do not have problems as others do.
They are as proud of their violent actions as some people are proud of their beautiful robes.
and in their inner beings they are always thinking about more evil things to do.
they are proud while they plan to oppress others.
and they talk boastfully about things that they have done here on the earth.
and listen to everything they say.
people say that he is greater than any other god, but he cannot find out.”
they never worry about anything, and they are always becoming richer.
and that I have not committed sins.
and every morning you punish me.
I would have been sinning against your people.
it was too hard for me to understand them.
and I understood what will happen to the wicked people after they die.
where they will fall down and die.
they will die in terrible ways.
Lord, when you arise, you will cause them to disappear.
and my feelings were hurt,
and I behaved like an animal toward you.
and you hold my hand.
and at the end of my life, you will receive me and honor me.
there is nothing on this earth that I desire more than that.
but, God, you continue to enable me to be strong;
I belong to you forever.
you will get rid of those who abandon you.
and to have Yahweh protect me
and to proclaim to others all that he has done for me.
